summary: Trap the souls of creatures in scrolls to summon by your side.
descriptionHtml:
Adds new spell, Soul Write, that lets you write down the souls of the defeated so that they can be summoned by your side. 40 souls to catch!
Conditions:
Must have blank scroll.
Humanoids (player race types, Falmer, and Forsworn) can not have there souls written (werewolfs can).
Undead can not have there souls written.
Dragons can not have there souls written.
Summoned souls take up Conjured summon slot (can not have more then one without twin souls perk).
Summoned creatures only last 1 minute.

Soul Write can be purchased by Phinis Gestor (found at The College of Winterhold).
Blank scrolls can be found any where that soul gems can be found.

Console Commands:
player.addspell 02005eea
player.additem 03005eeb ? (? = number of scrolls you want)

Things to do:
Add \"boss\" type werewolfs (they can not be written atm)
Add leveled wolf types (can be written now but only summons lowest level)
Add Horses (need to check to see how this effects riding them)
Add Elementals.

This mod does nothing for Dawnguard creatures. Sucks I know but I don\'t own the addon yet.

If you have a problem with summoning a creature, do not get a soul scroll, or got the wrong soul scroll. Please tell me the creature you killed, what level you are (kind of important for leveled creatures), and what scroll you got if any.

Mod can also be found at: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=87893914
author: phoenixCr0w
